sentences.en: A jetty pier, some two thousand yards along , extended into the roadstead.
sentences.cn: 举目南望, 有一条长达两公里的长堤, 象一只巨臂伸在苏伊士运河的港湾里.

sentences.en: A jetty projected into the river.
sentences.cn: 一处小码头直插进河水中.

sentences.en: He and I were sitting out on his jetty dangling our legs in the water.
sentences.cn: 我和他坐在他的码头上，双腿在水中荡悠。

sentences.en: Hey, Bob, let's go over and check out Jetty's new spots car.
sentences.cn: 喂, 鲍伯.我们去看看杰里新买的跑车.

sentences.en: I tried to regain my balance but I fell off the jetty and into the drink.
sentences.cn: 我试图恢复平衡,但我却从栈桥上跌了下来,掉进了水里.

sentences.en: Jetty protection of banks is slightly different.
sentences.cn: 用防波堤保护河岸则情况略有不同.

sentences.en: Over there, just behind the jetty.
sentences.cn: 在那儿, 在小码头的后面.

sentences.en: Pile jetty is one of the most normal structure of harbor engineering.
sentences.cn: 桩基码头是港口工程中最常用的码头结构形式之一,应用极其广泛.

sentences.en: Rumble, rumble -- beneath the jetty a battle cry bursts forth.
sentences.cn: 海塘下轰隆轰隆地腾起了喊杀声.

sentences.en: Standing at the jetty as the steamer moves away. Flower of Malaya, I can not stay.
sentences.cn: 轮船启航时见你站在码头上,马来亚之花啊, 我无法留下.

sentences.en: The boat turned into the bay, and Lucy could see two small figures on the jetty.
sentences.cn: 小船已拐进海湾, 露西看到码头上有两个小小的影子.

sentences.en: The harbour master ordered the crew to berth the ship at No. 1 jetty.
sentences.cn: 港长命令船员们将船碇泊于1号码头.

sentences.en: The paid the ship off from the jetty.
sentences.cn: 他们将船平稳地驶离码头.

sentences.en: The waves slapped against the jetty.
They paid the ship off from the jetty.
sentences.cn: 他们把船平稳地驶离码头.

words.tran_cn: 喷射，喷嘴；喷气式飞机；黑玉
射出；[航] 乘喷气式飞机

trans.tran_en: of or resembling jet, esp in colour or polish

trans.tran_cn: 防波堤，码头，[建]建筑物的突出部
trans.tran_en: a wide wall or flat area built out into the water, used for getting on and off boats
